parameters.name: caseinfo
parameters.value: {'feature': '微信公众号', 'story': '获取token', 'title': '成功获取token', 'request': {'method': 'get', 'url': 'https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/token', 'params': {'grant_type': 'client_credential', 'appid': 'wx3bfc4b9a1eadad14', 'secret': '16bdc72d8d3ba91c45865447f360bf3b'}}, 'extract': {'access_token': ['json', '$.access_token', 0], 'expires_in': ['json', '$.expires_in', 0]}, 'validate': {'equals': {'断言状态码为200': [200, 'status_code'], '断言有效期为7200': [7200, '${read_yaml(expires_in)}']}}}
